thread.title_full: Keltron: Keltron Delivers Advanced Defence Electronics Equipment to Leading Entities | Kochi News - Times of India

author: Times Of India
title: Keltron: Keltron Delivers Advanced Defence Electronics Equipment to Leading Entities | Kochi News - Times of India
text: Kochi: Keltron has handed over strategic defence electronics equipment manufactured by the company to defence and public sector entities, including Bharat Electronics Ltd, Naval Physical and Oceanographic Laboratory (NPOL) and Hindustan Shipyard Ltd, at a function held here on Thursday.At the event, held in the presence of industries minister P Rajeeve, the state-of-the-art systems, including sonar power amplifier, marine sonar array, transducer elements, submarine echo sounder, submarine cavitation meter, sonar transmitter system, submarine towed array and active noise cancellation system, were handed over.Rajeeve said Keltron will achieve a turnover of Rs 1,000 crore this financial year. He also said the company created history by manufacturing the country's first super capacitor as part of the 100-day programme of govt.On the same occasion, Keltron also received three major defence orders, including one for the manufacture of flight-in-air mechanism module from Naval Science and Technological Laboratory (NSTL), Visakhapatnam. Additionally, there was an order from Bharat Dynamics Ltd for India's first indigenously developed, NPOL-designed torpedo power amplifier and a letter of intent from Rekise Marine Pvt Ltd, a startup chosen by Navy to build an autonomous underwater vessel, for the manufacture of bow and flank arrays.
